Description: Selling off another one of my guitars...this is a USED 2005 Gibson Les Paul Junior with a nice 2018 Gibson case. The Guitar is used and has a headstock repair, but don't let that disway you. I've played other Juniors but this one has IT! Sounds ssssoooo good it's no wonder the previous owner saved the guitar and made the repair. It is used and has some wear but nothing that effects the playability.Plus Juniors look better all worn. Guitar has a single P-90 pickup, lightning bar bridge/tail piece, mahognay body and neck, gloss Nitro finish (NOT satin or worn) with Rosewood fretboard NOT baked maple, Obeche or any of the other Gibson substitute fretboard woods. NO PCB electronics - It is point to point factory hand wired. Just a good sounding MADE IN THE USA Gibson Les Paul Junior and if you look at the headstock you will notice it says Les Paul Junior as where others just say Les Paul model. A nice new 2018 Gibson case is included. I think it's the lowest priced Junior with case on E-bay... The Hoildays are here so get yourself a guitar! Because if you snooze you loose. Gibson Les Paul Junior...The original bare bones Rock N Roll machine! "For those out there who don't know, whenever you break a neck on a Les Paul and you get it repaired and plug it in - always sounds better. Always sounds better. It's quite a price to get your guitar to sound better." - Kirk Hammett * this item is used - no returns *sorry no international shipping CHECK OUT MY OTHER COOL GUITAR STUFF
Title: 2005 Gibson Les Paul Junior - USED
ConditionDescription: 2005 Gibson Les Paul Junior w/case - USED
